reviewText: Gave a not bad review because some of the movies were not as I expected them to be. They did come in great shape. I have only watched half of the movies but what I have watched I have liked. Some more than others. I would recommend this to anyone who likes based on true story movies. It's a good collection and give many options based on what you may like.
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: I have watched 20 of the 25 movies already and have enjoyed all exept 2. I didn't enjoy them because they were about subjects that I am not interested in. All of the movies have been interesting enough to really hold my attention and I found myself holding my breathe many times as I was wanting to help the character in their difficulties. I personally think this is an excellent collection for the price and I am very happy I bought them. The movies are not Oscar winning but tell of tales of great courage and determination in facing adversity.
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: Most of those movies have aged (clothes, hairstyles, cars) but some stories are still interesting. I always love those true stories especially when women are the main character. So far, only one was really boring. The dvds come with 3 or 4 movies on each.The price for the whole collection was attractive so I would recommend them for Winter or rainy days becaue it is always nice to watch an entire movie without commercials. And they are true stories.
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: great selection for the price...contains many of the best lifetime movies that entertain and provide enjoyment for many evenings to come
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: I'm sure I would have enjoyed these movies had I got to watch them. Lifetime puts out some pretty good shows. But every one of these DVD-Rs were scratched and damaged. Returned twice to no avail.
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: There are some really good ones, and I am looking forward to watching the rest.  However will let you know later.
summary: Have not finished all, but so far so good.
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: Definitely Drama and Human Interest... Pull up a pillow and bring your tea or coffee.. Pop some popcorn but don't forget the Kleenex. Some selections of this series really make you think. I can see life from the point of view of each of the characters.
Title: 25 Great Movies Based on True Stories - 25

reviewText: If you adore Lifetime movies, this is THE best deal ever. They include all of your favorite classics! You will NOT be sorry when you order this. Hours and hours and hours of Valerie Bertenelli, Delta Burke, and so many others! Buy it, you will not be sorry! Great seller and fast delivery
